identity.name: Lumière Noir
identity.archetype: Electric & Neon (Archetype 2) mixed with Jewel & Luxury (Archetype 5)
identity.core_philosophy: Every interaction should feel like the opening credits of a blockbuster. Dark voids, glowing accents, and fluid motion.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-wide for H1/H2. Use 'text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-white to-white/50' for cinematic effect.
usage_rules.body: High legibility. tracking-normal. Use font-light (300) for large paragraphs to look elegant.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Primary color (#FFB400) is for CTAs and 'Active' states only. Do not overuse.
Use 'accent' (#4F46E5) for subtle depth lighting or secondary highlights.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Avoid cramped UIs.

grid_systems.landing: Mode A (Tetris Grid): Mix hero posters (col-span-2 row-span-2) with standard cards.
grid_systems.dashboard: Mode B (Control Room): Dense, 1px borders, no gaps between cells (border-collapse feel).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-neon rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-white/50 hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4

cards.movie_poster: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg aspect-[2/3] border-0 transition-transform hover:scale-105 duration-500

inputs.style: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 rounded-md h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-white/30

navigation.header: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5 h-20 flex items-center justify-between px-8

media.image_style: Cinematic. High contrast. Always add a subtle gradient overlay (bg-gradient-to-t from-black/80 to-transparent) at the bottom of images to ensure text readability.

hero_backgrounds.desc: Sci-fi group standing, good for hero banner
Red light room, moody, good for thriller section

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds is at least WCAG AA compliant. Use text-gray-300 instead of text-gray-500.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings are mandatory. Use ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2 ring-offset-background.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Lumière Noir' cinema experience. It must feel expensive, dark, and fluid. Do not build a generic white SaaS app.
instructions_to_main_agent.setup: First, update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided in this JSON. Install 'lucide-react' for icons.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use the existing Shadcn components in /components/ui but HEAVILY customize them via className props to match the 'Lumière Noir' aesthetic (remove white backgrounds, add glassmorphism).
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid attributes to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, movie cards). Format: 'movie-card-{id}', 'book-btn', 'login-input'.

specific_pages.landing: Use a full-screen hero with the 'Sci-fi group' image. Overlay a gradient. Use 'Anton' font for the main title 'EXPERIENCE CINEMA REBORN'.
specific_pages.booking: Create a visual seat map. Use SVG circles. Available = border-white/20. Selected = bg-primary shadow-neon. Occupied = bg-red-900/20 text-red-900 cursor-not-allowed.
specific_pages.admin: Use a sidebar layout. Dark glass sidebar. Content area with 'Control Room' grid density.

universal_guidelines.no_gradients_text: Do not use gradients on small text.
universal_guidelines.no_center_align: Do not center align the entire app.
universal_guidelines.micro_animations: Every button must have a hover state.
universal_guidelines.spacing: Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
